name: Ryan Royalty
bio: Ryan is an aspiring Full Stack web developer living in Nottingham, NH with his wife, Samantha, and two dogs, Franconia and Tuckerman. While Ryan does not play any musical instruments himself, he loves listening to others play and was very excited to work on a social media application geared towards musicians. When Ryan isn't working on web projects, he enjoys spending time in nature, reading, visiting local breweries, and practicing Uechi Ryu karate.

name: Bjorn Yourey
bio: Bjorn recently graduated as a full stack web developer and lives in Bow, NH. He loves exploring various fields in the coding world and willing to push himself to learn more. He is also an SEO Analyst and enjoys building websites for his clients. He loves listening to different genres of music, is a die hard Manchester United soccer fan and watching thriller / psychological movies.

name: Jon Hammond
bio: Jonathan is a full-stack Web Application Developer, currently living in Salem, MA. He has an interest in user experience, responsive web design, and data analysis. His primary tech goal is to influence national policy with concrete data that overcomes partisan thinking. He believes that data, good or bad, generates insights that drive public and personal opinion, and would like to contribute to educating and highlighting malicious data. When he isn't coding, Jonathan is often boxing, doing yoga, reading a book, or binging on a 700-episode anime.
